text: Aung Thein Lin ( ; also spelled Aung Thein Linn) is a Burmese politician, and a member of parliament at the Pyithu Hluttaw from the South Okkalapa constituency. The former brigadier general in the Myanmar Army was mayor of Yangon from 2003 to 2011. He was a major in the military in 1988 and later became the commander of Light Infantry Division 101 and then deputy minister of Industry-2 as well as an executive of the junta’s mass organization, the Union Solidarity and Development Association (USDA), which was transformed into the Union Solidarity and Development Party in April 2010. ==References== Category:Burmese military personnel Category:Union Solidarity and Development Party politicians Category:Mayors of Yangon Category:People from Yangon Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Burma) Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Defence Services Academy alumni
title: Aung Thein Lin
